name: БоксБалет
summary: One day, a delicate ballerina named Olya meets the rough, surly boxer Evgeny. The contrast between their worlds and their philosophies is so sharp that even the possibility of these two characters crossing paths seems incredible.
info:
• 中文名: 拳击芭蕾
  • 别名: Boxballet
  • 上映年度: 2021-06-14(俄罗斯)
  • 片长: 15分钟
